title: Sweet Mischief
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Nico-saaan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, if it isn’t Chika. What brings you here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~. I was thinking of planning another prank with you, Nico-san! We’ll make sure Riko-chan and Maki-chan won’t find out this time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’ve got some guts, Chika. Alright, I’m in!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yaaay! Then, let’s think about it over some mikan. Here, I brought a lot with me~. They taste the best around this time of the year♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Thanks.... Mmn, it’s sweet and delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, look Nico-san! The peel came off of this one perfectly~. It looks like a star, doesn’t it? I’ll go try peeling another one like a flower~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Nico can do that too. Watch this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Man.... Nico is really a genius at everything, huh? Behold, this peel is the pinnacle of art!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oooh, that’s amazing! Can I take a picture of it? I want to show it to the rest of Aqours~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I guess it can’t be helped. Go ahead.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Thank you! I’ll come to hang out again sometime with lots more mikan, okay~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Be careful on your way home!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>....I feel like I forgot something.... Oh well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
